posts.topic: Bandra Budget Brunch Looks Under ₹2000

slides: Maya confidently stands outside a minimalist cafe in Bandra, wearing a pastel floral co-ord set (crop top + flowy midi skirt), white chunky sneakers, and a small beige crossbody bag. Subtle smile.

Maya poses elegantly at an outdoor cafe table, sipping iced coffee. She's wearing high-waisted light denim culottes, a fitted white ribbed tank, an unbuttoned oversized printed shirt (e.g., abstract floral), and gold hoop earrings. Relaxed yet chic.

Maya walks down a vibrant Bandra street near Ranwar Village murals, wearing a vibrant orange linen midi dress, a denim jacket tied around her waist, tan slip-on sandals, and oversized black sunglasses. Powerful stride.
Close-up of accessories: Stacked rings on Maya's fingers, layered delicate gold necklaces peeking from her top, a textured vegan leather bag.
Flat lay on a simple background: The three main outfit pieces (co-ord, culottes, dress) arranged with a small label indicating 'Under ₹2000' subtly.
Maya laughing candidly while adjusting her sunglasses, showcasing genuine happiness and ease.
